attributes.action: Evolve this petition service towards an electronic assembly by
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
- adding a comment to the support of a petition
- opposing to a petition with a comment,
- supporting petition by transaction (I support your petition if you support my petition)
- delegating or exchanging right to support petition which apply to a ministry

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
